messages.subject: Restraining myself....
messages.msgSnippet: Somebody posted this question on a local homeschooling list. It s not an unschooling list, but I had to restrain myself from making a snotty reply. The
messages.messageBody:
Somebody posted this question on a local homeschooling list. It's not an
unschooling list, but I had to restrain myself from making a snotty reply.

The question: Can someone recommend a high school level Consumer Math
program???

My desired reply: The Mall.

Kathryn, trying to behave herself


Come to the Northeast Unschooling Conference, Memorial Day Weekend, May
26-28, 2006 in Peabody, Massachusetts! www.NortheastUnschoolingConference.com


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
